features.heading: Why Choose WaveSpeed AI for Green Screen Removal?
features.description: Achieve professional results with our cutting-edge AI technology that simplifies the green screen removal process.

items.title: Fast Processing
items.description: Receive instant results as our efficient AI removes green screens in seconds.

items.title: User-Friendly Interface
items.description: No expertise needed. Simply upload your photo and let our AI handle the rest.

items.title: Secure and Private
items.description: Your images are processed on-device, ensuring your privacy and security are maintained.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Transform your images in three simple steps

items.title: Upload Your Image
items.description: Drag and drop or browse to upload your photo containing a green screen. We support JPG, PNG, and WebP formats.

items.title: AI Processes the Image
items.description: Our intelligent AI efficiently removes the green background, replacing it with your choice of a new backdrop.

items.title: Download Your Edited Photo
items.description: Check the results with our comparison slider and save your newly edited image in high resolution.

testimonial.heading: What Our Users Are Saying
testimonial.description: Join countless satisfied users who elevate their images with WaveSpeed AI.

items.name: Jessica Smith
items.comment: The green screen removal process was so quick and easy! My video thumbnails have never looked better!

items.name: Daniel Lee

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your queries about green screen removal with WaveSpeed AI.

items.title: What types of backgrounds can be used after removing the green screen?
items.description: You can use any image or solid color background after removing the green screen, allowing for complete creative freedom to enhance your images.

items.title: Is there a limit on the number of photos I can process?
items.description: Each user gets 30 free credits daily to process photos, enabling you to remove green screens from multiple images without hassle.

items.title: Can I use the edited content for my projects?
items.description: Absolutely! Users with any subscription plan can utilize their edited content for commercial and personal use.

items.title: How do you ensure my data privacy?
items.description: All images are processed securely in your browser, guaranteeing that your photos never leave your device or get stored on our servers.

footer.heading: Ready to Remove Green Screens from Your Photos?
footer.description: Experience WaveSpeed AI today and transform your images with ease. No sign-up necessary.
